title: Host no Furachi na Love Game
description: Haruka has always been admiring the No.1 host of that industry, so he entered a high-class host club to take an apprenticeship. However, the picture of the No.1 getting pasted there wasn’t the man he admires but Ryou, a super self-centered host who emits an overwhelming aura. Upon seeing Haruka’s rebellious attitude against Ryou’s arrogant behavior from the first sight, for some reasons, it was decided that Haruka would work at Ryou’s shop as a newbie―?
